name: Introduction to React Native
description: Learn the basics of React Native development and build your first mobile app.

syllabus.content: Overview of React Native, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple mobile app using React Native components.

name: Advanced React Native.
description: Take your React Native skills to the next level with advanced concepts and real-world applications.
prerequisites: Completion of Introduction to React Native
Experience with state management in React

syllabus.topic: Advanced State Management in React Native
syllabus.content: Exploring advanced state management techniques in React Native applications.
Integrating native modules into your React Native projects for enhanced functionality.

name: React Native UI Design Mastery
description: Master the art of designing beautiful and responsive user interfaces in React Native.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of mobile app design principles

syllabus.content: Creating responsive and adaptive layouts for various devices.
Customizing and styling native components to achieve a unique look and feel.

name: React Native for Cross-Platform Development
description: Explore the power of React Native for building cross-platform applications that run seamlessly on iOS and Android.

syllabus.content: Understanding the fundamentals of cross-platform development with React Native.
Implementing advanced deployment strategies for cross-platform React Native apps.

name: Digital Marketing Testing and Debugging
description: Learn the best practices for testing and debugging React Native applications to ensure a smooth development process.
prerequisites: Experience with unit testing in JavaScript

syllabus.content: Implementing unit tests for React Native components and functions.
Exploring effective strategies for debugging React Native applications.
